data.title: St Joseph's and St Gregory's Catholic Primary School
data.meta_description: School Ratings for St Joseph's and St Gregory's Catholic Primary School, Chester Road, Bedford, MK40 4HN. This school was rated Good by Ofsted in November 2023. For it's latest set of KS2 results 45 percent of students met the expected standard in Reading, Writing and Maths and 0 percent of students met the higher standard.
data.text:
St Joseph's and St Gregory's Catholic Primary School, situated in Queen's Park, Bedford (MK40 4HN), is a warm and inclusive educational institution renowned for providing a safe, happy, and well-rounded education. Its priority is nurturing every child's love, inclusion, and potential by delivering high-quality teaching in an environment where all are valued as part of a diverse community.

A few key facts about St Joseph's and St Gregory's:

Headteacher is dedicated to equipping students with an engaging and aspirational education that fosters achievement for all.

Children are celebrated for their kindness, compassion, and empathy, reflecting the school' s commitment to building a caring community.

St Joseph's and St Gregory's Catholic Primary School & Nursery is part of the OLICAT, which unites schools across London and the Eastern region.

Despite telephone difficulties, the school can be contacted via email at office@sjsg.beds.olicatschools.org.

Children in Reception are well-prepared for Year 1.

The school is recognized for exceptional early years education, with pupils in Nursery and Reception displaying positive attitudes to learning.

St Joseph's and St Gregory's received a positive report from Ofsted in October 2023, commending the children's enjoyment of their education and the school's ambitions to improve pupil achievement.

The school has an active community, with activities such as First Friday Prayer Chain, memorializing King Charles III's coronation, and Maths focused events like the NSPCC Number Day.

The school has a vacancy for a SENDCo.

St Joseph's and St Gregory's participates in national competitions and has recently celebrated students' achievements in sports and academics.

Enrollment information for children born between September 1, 2019, and August 31, 2020, who will start in September 2024, is also available on the school's website.
